item.title: SSH Setup for 2767
item.description: These are instructions for the 2767 team on how to configure easy SSH access to the roboRIO from macOS or Linux. (PuTTY instructions coming…) Linux and macOS In the steps below, $ is the command-line prompt and should not be typed when entering commands. Grab a mentor for a walk-through of these instructions if you need help! Verify you have a $HOME/.ssh directory and that it has permission of drwx------.
